dt.t: {ldquo}… And just {wi}FYI{/wi}, my own days on the Chester's Mill PD are over.{rdquo}
({wi}FYI{/wi}, everyone who is anyone is sitting in the Grill Room for lunch, not the more formal Pool Room.)

dt: {bc}a usually brief statement or communication that is intended to advise or warn someone

dt.t: Just an {wi}FYI{/wi}, the district office will be closed Monday …

shortdef: a usually brief statement or communication that is intended to advise or warn someone
